title: WTTF T206 HOFer with DRUM back
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTTF T206 HOFer with DRUM back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Looking for a T206 HOFer with a DRUM back.  Looking for a PSA 1.5 or 2, or an SGC 20-30.  Would also consider lower grades if they are presentable and there is no back damage.  Could possibly consider slightly higher grades too.

Will trade the following two cards:

1) T206 Rube Manning with UZIT back SGC 30

2) T206 Jack Warhop with DRUM back SGC 20

Plus I also have these cards still available to work out a deal:

[url]http://s282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade[/url]/ 

And I also have an SGC 50 Shag Shaughnessy with an Old Mill back as additional trade bait if interested, and some cash.

EDITED: Seems I have underestimated the toughness of this Combo.  So a few other cards I have available to offer in a possible trade are:

T206 Demmitt (St. Louis varation) SGC A (beautiful card, just slightly trimmed at the top.  Nicest you will ever see)

T206 O'Hara (St. Louis variation) SGC 20

T214 Victory Tobacco Joe Kelly SGC 10 (1 of 1 with no others known).


Note: the Shag, Demmitt, O'Hara, UZIT, DRUM, and Victory Tobacco are only available for this trade, and are not for sale.

[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206ManningRube_PitchingUZIT.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206WarhopJackDRUM.jpg[/IMG]

posts.post_title: WTTF T206 HOFer with DRUM back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I would also like to acquire a HOFer with a Red Hindu back via trade.  Looking for SGC 30 or higher, PSA 2 or higher.  I have all the above items available for trade.  Thanks.

And of course I'm also still looking for a HOFer with Drum back.

for both (T206 Red Hindu and Drum backed HOFers).  Everything is still available for trade.
